entries.abort: You've got to be kidding me?! You can't abort NOW!
entries.arrival_phase_1: pcontrast3 Beissa: < pcontrast1 The hijacked freighter should arrive there any minute, now... pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_2: pcontrast3 Beissa: < pcontrast1 There! Valarian's henchmen have flown right into our trap! Disable the ship and clear out the Valarian fighters. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Enemy craft detected on attack vector. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Enemy activity has stopped. pcontrast3 >
entries.capture_complete: Whew! All right. The ship is ours.
entries.capture_phase_1: Whoah! They have mini-turrets mounted in the corridors! This will take a bit longer than we suspected...
entries.capture_phase_2: Okay, the turret defense system is down. We are now moving on to the command deck...
entries.capture_started: Okay! Cover us. We're going to advance on the bridge...
entries.complete: pcontrast3 Smuggler Alliance: < pcontrast1 You are on the path to redemption, pilot! But there is still more to do... pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 An escorting craft has been destroyed, %DI remain. pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 All escorting craft have been destroyed. pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: The weapons shipment is destroyed! Now we'll have to start this operation all over again. You FAIL.
entries.failed_escape: Valarian's thugs made off with the hijacked transport! You FAIL!
entries.panic_1: Apparently, Lady Valarian's not going to let this shipment go without a fight!
entries.panic_3: Keep those fighters off our backs!
entries.panic_4: Keep those fighters off our backs!
entries.panic_5: Keep those fighters off our backs!
entries.quest_disable_d: Target the freighters engines to disable it
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the recovered freighter out of the system
entries.quest_location_d: Deep space near the gas giant Yavin
entries.quest_recover_d: Pull up near the freighter to begin the capture process
entries.recovery_success: pcontrast3 Beissa: < pcontrast1 The weapons shipment has been safely returned to Hutt control. Jabba will be most pleased! pcontrast3 >
entries.split_quest_alert: pcontrast3 Beissa: < pcontrast1 Since you have decided to come back to Jabba, we would like a little demonstration for Lady Valaria so that she may remember you fondly.  Hunt down your replacements. pcontrast3 >
entries.target_disabled: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Target has been disabled. pcontrast3 >
entries.taunt_1: We took it from you once, we can do so again.
entries.taunt_3: We took it from you once, we can do so again.
entries.taunt_4: We took it from you once, we can do so again.
entries.taunt_5: We took it from you once, we can do so again.
entries.thanks_2: You sure know how to handle yourself in a fight!
entries.thanks_3: Now that's what I call pilot skill, my friend!
entries.thanks_4: Now that's what I call pilot skill, my friend!
entries.thanks_5: Now that's what I call pilot skill, my friend!
entries.title: Yavin System: Recover Stolen Weapons Shipment
entries.title_d: Steal back for Jabba the weapons shipment that was never rightfully his to begin with
